title: Separate notification channels (Ralph vs Claude)
description: Ralph and Claude need separate ntfy topics. Ralph uses per-project topics (etans-ralph-<project>) so same project shares notifications. Claude gets its own topic (etans-ralphClaude). Multiple Ralph instances on same project share topic, different projects get different topics.

acceptanceCriteria.text: RALPH_NTFY_TOPIC defaults to 'etans-ralph-<project>' using git repo name
Same project = same Ralph topic (instances share)
Claude notifications never mix with Ralph iterations
Topic prefix configurable via RALPH_NTFY_PREFIX (default: etans-ralph)
Notification includes [Ralph] or [Claude] prefix in message
